title: Power and Energy Equipment Design/Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic electrical circuits, fundamental drafting skills, and core engineering design concepts
context.additional_context: Hybrid text-based learning environment using digital devices (tablets/PCs). Cultivates real-world power equipment design problem-solving through team projects

learning_goals: Learners can accurately draft the external structure of a transformer using 3D modeling by applying basic design principles of power equipment
Learners can collaboratively complete a circuit design process reflecting energy efficiency requirements with a team
Learners can submit design documents compliant with electrical safety standards as project deliverables
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
